I Am Tyler The

I specialize in Design, UI/UX, and Programming

View My Work

I Specialize in

UI/UX layouts for websites as well as frontend applications.

Concepting

When concepting I try think about similar projects for inspiration. I then brainstorm things to add to make it better. While also, learning new skills. I belive there's always something to learn.

UI/UX

I always keep the target auidance in mind for every project. I make sure the user interaction is always a priority. I try to keep interaction simplistic and smooth.

Design

When I design, I implement color theory as well as incorporate the clients needs.

Interaction

I always make sure that my clients and users are sastified. When it comes to clients I make sure to hear them out entirely and fullfill their needs. I make sure that the users also have a wonderful experience interaction with my projects.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projectrs are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

I like to go over the main bulletpoints of what is needed for the project, as well as the motivation behind it.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

I then take the information and plan out what is needed and where it will go and rough draft the concept.

3

Discuss The Project

I then find out how the client feels about the plan. discuss any changes and get ready to build.

4

UX/UI planning

My last step before building is planning the user experience, then I bring it to life.
